translation1: "Today, let's take a look at some \"strange hot searches.\" What is considered normal public opinion? Let's randomly select three hot searches: \"February 2nd, two dragons lift their heads,\" \"Good-looking Friends Rise in Price,\" and \"AliExpress Event.\" Public opinion spreads and forms a wave, and then the index drops (a smooth curve) and eventually dissipates. If there is a secondary wave of public opinion, there may be a small \"camel peak\" that reappears.They look exactly the same as the \"Internet Public Opinion Evolution Model\" displayed on the official website of the Cyberspace Administration of China. What is abnormal public opinion? By randomly selecting six hot searches from the same event, it presents the characteristics of \"peak shape\", \"sawtooth shape\", and \"cliff shape\".[Peak shape] refers to human-induced heating, quickly climbing the hot search rankings and attracting widespread attention; [Sawtooth shape] refers to periodic heating, ensuring that the topic remains on the hot search rankings; [Cliff shape] refers to collective withdrawal, with the hot search fulfilling its \"function\" and moving on to a new task or battlefield. In Figure 9, the peak of heat for one event coincides with the trough of another event, with only a few seconds difference, indicating that the unified red army has been assigned a new task and launched a new round of attacks. The professionalism of the black publicity is evident: for dozens of hot searches simultaneously ranking on the list, which ones attract attention, which ones are responsible for popularization, which ones provoke public opinion, which ones divert attention, which ones affect cognition, which ones mislead judgement, which ones stimulate emotions, and which ones influence decision-making. The black publicity accounts are divided into batches and targeted at different nodes, almost considering all factors in the spread of public opinion.Propagation is a science, putting aside personal stances and emotions, public relations will also disappear without a trace when faced with objective data. Every action leaves a trace, and we will uncover these traces together. Data source: Time Machine Hot Search."

Select three trending topics randomly, the rise of the head of the dragon on the 2nd of February, the price rise of ORLON, and the Huolala incident; the public opinion spread to form a peak, and then the [index declined] to form a (smooth curve) until it finally dissipated; if a secondary public opinion occurs, there will be a small hump again. Randomly select three trending topics from the same event, there are [solitary peak], [zigzag] and [cliff]. translation1: "Taking a foot bath and getting an electric shock from the bubbles? Choosing the right foot bath basin can have excellent therapeutic and health effects on the feet. Today, the editor of Jumei will answer this question and hope to help friends. With the enhancement of people's health awareness, foot bath basins are becoming more and more popular among consumers, and a large number of products with different specifications have emerged in the market, providing consumers with a wide range of choices, from more than 100 yuan to thousands of yuan.In related data, compared with traditional home appliances, sales of health-related home appliances such as foot bath basins are booming, but foot bath basins do not have a dedicated industry standard, so there is a certain safety risk. \"It's too dangerous to soak your feet in electric water!\" Mr. Li told reporters. Recently, he bought a foot bath basin as a birthday gift for his father, but his father felt numbness in his feet when soaking.Mr. Li initially thought it was caused by the vibration function of the foot bath, but he didn't expect that even after turning off the vibration function, his father still felt a tingling sensation on the soles of his feet. Mr. Li tried using a pen, and surprisingly, the pen lit up. Mr. Li discovered that the water in the foot bath was conducting electricity. Later, he contacted the merchant, and the merchant's attitude was not bad, even though he returned the foot bath, Mr. Li still felt unhappy.Because he found that this popular foot bath basin has no clear and detailed industry regulations in terms of applicable population, materials guaranteeing safety at the highest temperature setting, etc. However, generally speaking, foot bath basins do not have electrical problems, but it cannot be ruled out that some products may not have been strictly controlled during production. Therefore, when purchasing, choose a modular foot bath basin.Water and electricity are separated, and there is no safety hazard. You can test it with an electric pen at will."

translation1: "Educational News: Beijing Reduces the Proportion of Special Students Admitted to Junior High Schools in Early 2016 - Xinhua Net, January 21st and 22nd. The examination for special students applying for junior high schools in Beijing was organized and implemented by the education committees of each district. This year, all districts in Beijing have reduced the proportion of special students admitted, making the competition for special students even more intense.Taking the Dongcheng District as an example, the ratio of primary school students with special talents in sports, arts, and science who are admitted to middle school this year does not exceed 5% of the total planned enrollment in the district. The planned enrollment is 380 people, and the attendance rate does not exceed 10% of the school's planned enrollment. Students with sports, arts, and science talents who have applied online are eligible to participate in the selection of special talent students. To facilitate students to participate in the examination nearby, the Dongcheng District continues the examination arrangement from last year, setting 1-2 examination sites in each school district, with a total of 13 examination sites.The examination topics are divided into examination areas, and are divided into time periods by hours. On the day of the examination, students will enter the examination points in different examination areas according to the time periods. The list of students who have passed the examination will be announced online by the Regional Education Admissions Examination Center on May 23rd, and students can check their examination results online."

This year, districts in Beijing have reduced the proportion of students with special talents in the enrollment, leading to more fierce competition in students with special talents. Take Dongcheng District as an example, the entrance proportion of students with special talents in the enrollment of middle schools does not exceed 5% of the total number in the district; the planned number is 380, and the proportion of students checking in at the school shall not exceed 10% of the enrollment plan of the school. translation1: "The curator of the China Sand Museum collaborated with the Saudi Arabian government to hold the first Contemporary Art Biennale in Saudi Arabia - Xinhua News Agency, Xinhua Net, December 12 (Reporters: Wang Hai Zhou, Hu Jun) The first Contemporary Art Biennale in Saudi Arabia - the Diriyah Contemporary Art Biennale, was officially opened to the public on the 11th in the Diriyah JAX Art District in the northwest of the Saudi capital Riyadh. A total of 64 artists from Saudi Arabia and China participated in the biennale. The biennale was co-curated by the Diriyah Contemporary Art Biennale Foundation in Saudi Arabia and the UCCA Center for Contemporary Art in China, with the director of the UCCA Center for Contemporary Art, Yan Xiaoyu, serving as the artistic director.According to the curatorial team, the theme of this biennale is \"Touching Stones to Cross the River\", which metaphorically represents the reform strategies adopted during the social and economic transformation period and also reflects the current state of social and cultural development in Saudi Arabia. The biennale covers an area of nearly 12,000 square meters, with six interconnected buildings displaying works in six units: \"Touching Stones to Cross the River\", \"Inheritance as Experiment\", \"Edge Thinking\", \"Towards the Public\", \"Beautiful New World\", and \"On the Spirit of Art\". Among them, the works of 27 Saudi artists account for more than 40% of the total number of works, covering various forms such as painting, installation art, and performance art. The works of 12 Chinese artists are also highly regarded, with some artists using innovative ways to create with recycled materials, such as Ice using discarded materials to reconstruct a classic landscape painting in his \"Behind the Story Series: Endless Mountains and Rivers\" (2014).Diriyah Biennale Foundation CEO Bakri said he hoped this year's biennale could establish an international dialogue, giving global audiences the opportunity to understand Saudi Arabia's vibrant cultural and creative industries and creative communities, and enhancing interaction. Tian Feiyu said: \"The goal of the biennale is double, on the one hand, it allows contemporary Saudi art to participate in the global dialogue, on the other hand, it allows Saudi audiences to immerse themselves in the world of contemporary art.\" It is understood that a series of lectures will be held during the opening period of the biennale, in which artists, curators, and opinion leaders in the creative industry will discuss topics such as cross-cultural exchange and the development of contemporary art."

translation1: "In September 2020, Mr. Lu learned about a factory in Yuejia Town, Zhejiang through a real estate agent. After several on-site visits, Mr. Lu decided to purchase the factory. In December of the same year, Mr. Lu negotiated with the owner's family member, Lin, on the details of purchasing the factory and signed a \"Factory Purchase and Sale Deposit Agreement.\" The agreement stipulated that if the buyer did not want to buy the factory, the deposit of 200,000 yuan would be returned to the seller. If the seller did not want to sell the factory, the deposit would be doubled and returned to the seller. Both parties agreed to sign the factory purchase and sale contract within a week.However, after that, both parties failed to reach a consensus on key contract terms such as the scope of the factory's sale and the payment method, which led to the delay in signing the house purchase contract. Considering that both parties failed to reach an agreement on the content of the contract, a few days later, Mr. Lin refunded the 200,000 yuan deposit to Mr. Lu. Mr. Lu had prepared for the house purchase, including the deposit and the down payment, but the seller did not sign the contract, which made Mr. Lu helpless and angry.For this reason, Mr. Lu filed a lawsuit against Mr. Lin to the Yuyang Municipal People's Court. The court held that since both parties failed to sign a formal contract, it cannot be solely attributed to the defendant, and it should be reasonably presumed that the negotiation failed. Therefore, this case should not apply the penalty of double compensation for breach of contract, and the defendant does not need to bear the responsibility of returning double the deposit. After the first-instance judgment, the plaintiff appealed.Recently, the Second Circuit Court upheld the original judgment. [Lawyer's Reminder] In the transaction process, it is necessary to exercise due diligence. As the buyer, you should exercise due diligence in verifying information such as the ownership of the property, whether the property is occupied by someone, and other relevant information when signing the contract. It is also necessary to clearly specify the specific time and location of delivery in the contract to avoid disputes between the parties when performing the contract."

Professor Liu Zhonghua, an academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, introduced at the opening ceremony: Xinhua is the source of Hunan Black Tea, and the emerging of the black tea injects new energy into the “colorful Hunan tea”. In recent years, the provincial Party committee and the provincial government have vigorously supported the development of the tea industry, promoted the construction of the Hunan tea industry of 100 billion and formed the development pattern of “three Xiang, four rivers, and five colors of tea”. The tea industry of the province has been promoting innovation, and main tea types such as green tea and black tea take turns to generate power; tea-travel integration is promoted in main tea production areas to drive income increase of tea farmers. Every type of tea takes turns to gain its spotlight, and now it is time for black tea. According to opinion of experts in the tea industry in the province, tea farmers pick black tea after green tea and have income in all four seasons, making the production value of tea gardens soar. At the opening ceremony, provincial leaders awarded plates to the fourth batch of enterprises authorized to use the trademark of “Hunan black tea”, and Xinhua was awarded the title of “source of Hunan black tea”. In the exhibition hall of Xinhua black tea, a tea merchant from Fujian took a fancy to a high mountain tea named “spring in ice” and placed an order immediately. Wang Zhun, secretary-general of provincial tea association, said happily that factors such as epidemic exert an impact on the tea market to a certain extent; however, based on the situations at the tea expo, there are various highlights. The red color of Xinhua black tea has instilled the essence of tea culture, and with its popularity and hot transactions, the Hunan tea industry is ushering in a new spring.

translation1: "The State Council's joint defense and joint control mechanism issued a document requiring strengthening the epidemic prevention and control of the novel coronavirus in port cities along the land border. It stipulates that persons who have recently left port cities along the land border (excluding those connected with Hong Kong and Macao) must present a negative nucleic acid test certificate within 48 hours, and persons traveling to port cities along the land border must undergo at least one nucleic acid test after arrival. The time range for this requirement is from the announcement of the port city scope by each province, district, and municipality to March 15, 2022.In addition, the notice also proposes that conditionally open ports can study setting epidemic prevention and control buffer zones within their jurisdictions. The person in charge of the National Health Commission's Disease Prevention and Control Agency introduced that for some port cities, cross-border trade is the main economic support, and the exchange between the two sides is frequent. By implementing differentiated management policies based on regions, a single line of epidemic prevention and control can become two lines of defense, which is expected to achieve the advance of the border epidemic prevention and control, reduce the spread of the epidemic, and achieve the maximum effect of epidemic prevention and control with the minimum social impact and cost.Recently, there have been several local clustered outbreaks of COVID-19 in our country, all of which were imported from overseas through ports of entry. The above-mentioned notice pointed out that this exposes some problems such as insufficient and untimely epidemic monitoring and early warning in some localities, non-implementation of closed-loop management for high-risk personnel, formality of regular nucleic acid testing, inadequate disposal of cold-chain products at all links, irregular management of centralized isolation sites, and inadequate scientific and accurate emergency response to the epidemic. The notice requires efforts to be made in nine aspects, including improving the epidemic prevention and control mechanism in port cities, improving the epidemic monitoring and early warning system, implementing border control measures, and strengthening the weak links in port city epidemic prevention and control, to scientifically and accurately carry out epidemic prevention and control work and tighten the external prevention and control line.The notice emphasizes that cities at ports of entry should synchronize the research and deployment of epidemic prevention and civilian livelihood protection work, publicize and open up civilian livelihood protection hotlines, regularly identify potential risks in the supply of basic life necessities and prices, and actively respond to and solve prominent problems reflected by the public. According to the notice, the aforementioned port cities include counties (cities, districts, banners) where land, water, and air ports are located, as well as the cities (prefectures, states, leagues) and directly administered municipalities where they are situated. The specific scope will be determined by each province (autonomous region, directly administered municipality) based on the needs of epidemic prevention and control and announced in a timely manner."

reference: Negative nucleic acid test result within 48 hours and setting up a "buffer zone", the State Council joint prevention and control mechanism issued a document to strengthen epidemic prevention and control in port cities - Xinhua News Xinhua News Agency Beijing December 11th (Reporters Dong Ruifeng, Gu Tiancheng) State Council joint prevention and control mechanism recently issued a notice about strengthening epidemic prevention and control of COVID-19 in port cities, asking people who recently left land border port cities (except those connected with ports of Hong Kong and Macao) to hold the negative result of nucleic acid test within 48 hours, and people who go to the land border port cities should take the nucleic acid test at least once after arrival. According to the notice, the time range of the aforementioned request is from the date when the province, autonomous region and city determine the scope of port cities and announce it until March 15, 2022. In addition, the notice also requests that port cities with the capability can study the possibility of setting up epidemic prevention and control buffer zone within their jurisdiction. According to the introduction of the person in charge of the Bureau of Disease Prevention and Control of the National Health Commission, for some port cities, cross-border trade is the main local economic pillar and the border residents from both sides have frequent exchanges. The implementation of the policy of zoning and differentiated management is to make one defense line of the spread of prevention and control into two lines, make it possible to move the gateway forward, reduce the risk of the spread of the epidemic, and to achieve the maximum effectiveness of epidemic prevention and control with the minimum social impact and social cost. Recently, there have been many local cluster outbreaks of diagnosed cases in China, all of which were imported from overseas through port cities. The notice points out that this has exposed some problems, such as the untimely monitoring and warning of epidemic in some places, the non-existing implementation of closed-loop management of personnel in high-risk positions, regular nucleic acid testing becoming a mere formality, the inadequate disinfection and sterilization of cold-chain items in all links, the non-standard management of centralized quarantine sites, and the unscientific and inaccurate emergency response of epidemic situation. The notice requests that efforts should be made in nine aspects, including improving the epidemic prevention and control mechanism in port cities, improving the epidemic monitoring and early warning system and implementing border control measures, to speed up the improvement of the weak links in the prevention and control of port cities, deliver the prevention and control work scientifically, accurately and without relaxing, as well as to strengthen the defense line of curbing imported cases. The notice stresses that all port cities should study and deploy the epidemic prevention and control and safeguard people's livelihood at the same time, publish and monitor the smooth running of the people's livelihood hotline, regularly check the potential dangers in the supply and price of basic life necessities, and timely solve and actively respond to the outstanding problems reflected by the masses. According to the notice, the port cities mentioned include counties (cities, districts, banners), cities (areas, prefectures, leagues) and municipalities directly under the central government where the open land, water and air ports are located, and specific scope shall be determined and timely announced by the provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the central government) according to the demand of epidemic prevention and control.

translation1: "More than 130 Asian American organizations in the US submitted a complaint to the US Department of Education and the Justice Department on May 23, accusing three Ivy League schools - Yale University, Brown University, and Dartmouth College - of discriminating against Asian American applicants in their admission process. The Asian American Education Alliance, which led the complaint, held a press conference in Washington on the same day. - Xu Jianmei, Xinhua News Agency, Washington, May 23rd.The chairman of the organization, Zhao Yu Kong, said at a press conference that in the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who meet the admission requirements of top American universities has increased many times over, but the proportion of Asians in these three top American universities has remained at the same level. Many studies have shown that these universities have systematically and persistently discriminated against Asian applicants in their so-called \"holistic\" admission process. Zhao Yu Kong introduced that a study by Sanders et al. in 2014 showed that among these three universities, the acceptance rate of Asians was the lowest compared to the number of applicants of all ethnicities.According to data from the US Department of Education, among all Ivy League schools, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest admission rates for Asian-American students. Yale University and Brown University have implemented de facto racial quotas for Asian-American applicants for more than 20 years. Zhu Yu told Xinhua News Agency reporters that they hope to submit a lawsuit and urge the US Department of Education and the Department of Justice to investigate and take measures to prevent these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asian-Americans in recruitment. They also hope that the universities being sued will take the issue seriously and change their admission policies towards Asian-Americans.Currently, the three colleges that have been complained about have not yet responded. The Asian American Education Alliance was established in 2015, at which time it filed a complaint against Harvard University for discrimination in admissions, but the US Department of Education did not accept it due to procedural reasons. In addition to American Chinese organizations, this time's appeal also includes Indian, Korean, Japanese, and Pakistani American educational organizations."

reference: Asian communities in the US complains about admission discrimination by Yale and two other Ivy League universities - Xinhuanet Message from Xinhua News Agency Washington on May 23 (journalist: Xu Jianmei): More than 130 Asian communities in the US submitted a complaint to the Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice in the US on May 23 to protest against the discrimination on Asian students in the enrollment of 3 Ivy League universities, Yale University, Brown University and Dartmouth College. Asian American Coalition for Education, who initiated the complaint, held a press conference in Washington on that day. According to the speech made by Zhao Yukong, chairman of the group, during the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who met the admission qualification of famous universities in the US has doubled and redoubled; however, in these famous universities in the US, the proportion of Asian students basically maintained at the same level. According to lots of research results, these universities “discriminated against Asian students in a long-term, continuous and systematic way” during the so-called “comprehensive consideration”of the admission process. As introduced by Zhao Yukong, according to research results of scholars such as Saunders in 2014, in these 3 universities, Asian students have the lowest acceptance rate among all the ethnic groups considering the number of applicants. Data from Department of Education of the US also indicates that among all the Ivy League Universities, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest acceptance rate of Asian students; Yale University and Brown University have been implementing racial quota of Asian applicants for more than 20 years. Zhao Yukong told the journalist of Xinhua News Agency that they wished that Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice of the US could conduct investigation after they submitted the complaint, and take measures to prevent these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asian students in the admission process after identifying the facts. They also wished that the universities being complained about could pay attention to this issue on their own initiative and change the recruitment policy for Asian students. The 3 universities being complained about have not responded yet. Established in 2015, Asian American Coalition for Education once made a complaint against Harvard University about admission discrimination, but the US Ministry of Education did not accept the complaint on procedural grounds. In addition to Asian groups in the US, the groups involved in the complaint also include Indian, Korean, Japanese Americans and Pakistani education groups in the US.

translation1: "The joint military exercise \"Peace Rescue-2021\" between China and Vietnam, which involved logistics support, successfully concluded on December 12. The Chinese team participating in the exercise safely returned to Guangxi, China, marking the successful completion of the 7-day exercise mission. This exercise focused on the important topic of humanitarian medical rescue, with both armies adhering to the mission of saving lives and providing aid. They completed joint logistics command, joint on-site rescue, and large-scale casualty treatment according to real combat standards, effectively enhancing the logistics support capabilities of both armies.The results of the exercise have been recognized by both the Chinese and Vietnamese armies. The head of the Vietnamese exercise guidance committee, Deputy Chief of Staff of the Vietnamese People's Army Logistics Department and Chief of Staff of the Vietnamese People's Army General Staff, Nguyen Tien Su, said at the closing ceremony of the exercise that through this exercise, the Vietnamese military doctors learned about the organization and professional activities of the Chinese military doctors, as well as the medical and protective equipment of the Chinese side.
